data.name: PSA_AsIsSecurityDefinition
data.value: grant select on [{{{schema}}}].[{{{entity}}}.AsIs] to [psa_abstractreader]; grant select on [{{{schema}}}].[{{{entity}}}.AsIs] to [psa_current_state_reader];

data.name: PSA_AsIsTriggerDefinition
data.value: create trigger [tr : {{{label}}}.AsIs {Reverse DML}] on [{{{schema}}}].[{{{entity}}}.AsIs] instead of insert,update,delete as -- do not alter/add/extend this trigger, or any psa trigger -- authored by slalom consulting 2014 begin; raiserror(N'DML Statements are not allowed on this AsIs view. Use the Control Abstraction [{{{schema}}}].[{{{entity}}}.Control] instead.',16,1) end;

data.name: PSA_AsIsViewDefinition
data.value: create view [{{{schema}}}].[{{{entity}}}.AsIs] with schemabinding as select [psa_entity_key] [PersistentEntityKey], [psa_entity_sequence] [PersistentEntityIncrement], [psa_start_period] [PersistentEntityValidFrom], isnull([psa_end_period],'9999-12-31 23:59:59.9999999') [PersistentEntityValidTo], [psa_dml_action] [PersistentEntityChangeAction], {{{columnset}}} from {{{domain}}} where [psa_archive_flag]=0 and [psa_active_state]=1 and [psa_current_flag]=1;

data.name: PSA_AsOfFunctionDefinition
data.value:
create function [{{{schema}}}].[{{{entity}}}.AsOf] ( @AsOfDateTime datetime2(7) ) returns table with schemabinding as return
select [psa_entity_key] [PersistentEntityKey], [psa_entity_sequence] [PersistentEntityIncrement], [psa_start_period] [PersistentEntityValidFrom], isnull([psa_end_period],'9999-12-31 23:59:59.9999999') [PersistentEntityValidTo], [psa_dml_action] [PersistentEntityChangeAction], {{{columnset}}} from {{{domain}}} where [psa_archive_flag]=0 and [psa_active_state]=1 and [psa_start_period]<=@AsOfDateTime and isnull([psa_end_period],'9999-12-31 23:59:59.9999999')>=@AsOfDateTime;

data.name: PSA_AsOfSecurityDefinition
data.value: grant select on [{{{schema}}}].[{{{entity}}}.AsOf] to [psa_abstractreader];

data.name: PSA_AsWasSecurityDefinition
data.value: grant select on [{{{schema}}}].[{{{entity}}}.AsWas] to [psa_abstractreader];

data.name: PSA_AsWasTriggerDefinition
data.value: create trigger [tr : {{{label}}}.AsWas {Reverse DML}] on [{{{schema}}}].[{{{entity}}}.AsWas] instead of insert,update,delete as -- do not alter/add/extend this trigger, or any psa trigger -- authored by slalom consulting 2014 begin; raiserror(N'DML Statements are not allowed on this AsWas view. Use the Control Abstraction [{{{schema}}}].[{{{entity}}}.Control] instead.',16,1) end;

data.name: PSA_AsWasViewDefinition
data.value: create view [{{{schema}}}].[{{{entity}}}.AsWas] with schemabinding as select [psa_entity_key] [PersistentEntityKey], [psa_entity_sequence] [PersistentEntityIncrement], [psa_start_period] [PersistentEntityValidFrom], isnull([psa_end_period],'9999-12-31 23:59:59.9999999') [PersistentEntityValidTo], [psa_dml_action] [PersistentEntityChangeAction], {{{columnset}}} from {{{domain}}} where [psa_archive_flag]=0;

data.name: PSA_BatchCountSecurityDefinition
data.value: grant select on [{{{schema}}}].[{{{entity}}}.BatchCount] to [psa_etl_manager];

data.name: PSA_BatchCountTriggerDefinition
data.value: create trigger [tr : {{{label}}}.BatchCount {Reverse DML}] on [{{{schema}}}].[{{{entity}}}.BatchCount] instead of insert,update,delete as -- do not alter/add/extend this trigger, or any psa trigger -- authored by slalom consulting 2014 begin; raiserror(N'DML Statements are not allowed on this aggregated BatchCount view. Use the Control Abstraction [{{{schema}}}].[{{{entity}}}.Control] instead to remove individual records.',16,1) end;

data.name: PSA_BatchCountViewDefinition
data.value: create view [{{{schema}}}].[{{{entity}}}.BatchCount] with schemabinding as select [psa_batch_id] [BatchUID], isnull(sum(case when [psa_dml_action]=N'I' then 1 else 0 end),0) [Inserted], isnull(sum(case when [psa_dml_action]=N'U' then 1 else 0 end),0) [Updated], isnull(sum(case when [psa_dml_action]=N'D' then 1 else 0 end),0) [Deleted], isnull(count([psa_entity_key]),0) [Total] from {{{domain}}} where [psa_batch_id] is not null group by [psa_batch_id];

data.name: PSA_ChangesFunctionDefinition
data.value:
create function [{{{schema}}}].[{{{entity}}}.Changes] ( @Version bigint ) returns table with schemabinding as return
select [psa_entity_key] [PersistentEntityKey], [psa_entity_sequence] [PersistentEntityIncrement], [psa_start_period] [PersistentEntityValidFrom], isnull([psa_end_period],'9999-12-31 23:59:59.9999999') [PersistentEntityValidTo], [psa_dml_action] [PersistentEntityChangeAction], {{{columnset}}} from changetable(changes {{{domain}}},@Version) c inner join {{{domain}}} d on c.[psa_surrogate_key]=d.[psa_surrogate_key] and d.[psa_current_flag]=1;

data.name: PSA_ChangesSecurityDefinition
data.value: grant select on [{{{schema}}}].[{{{entity}}}.Changes] to [psa_abstractreader];

data.name: PSA_ChangeTrackingDefinition
PSA_ControlViewDefinition
SYS_DatabaseProperties
data.value: select db_name() [database_name], [compatibility_level] from sys.databases where [database_id]=db_id();

data.name: PSA_DropRelatedObjects
PSA_DropTemporalGovernorDefinition
PSA_InstanceProperties
data.value: select db_name() [database_name], @@servername [instance_name], serverproperty('productlevel') [product_level], serverproperty('edition') [edition], parsename(convert(nvarchar(50),serverproperty('productversion')),4) [version];

data.name: SYS_QueryBehavior
PSA_RenameDefinition
PSA_RoleDefinitions
PSA_SchemaDefinition

PSA_TableDefinition
PSA_TemporalGovernorDefinition

SYS_TableMetadataDefinition
PSA_TablePropertyDefintion
data.value: exec [dbo].[sp_manage_table_properties] N'{{{domain}}}',N'{{{property}}}',N'{{{value}}}';

data.name: SYS_ColumnMetadataDefinition
PSA_ChangeTrackingSystemDefinition
PSA_ControlInsertDefinition
PSA_ControlUpdateDefinition
PSA_ColumnPropertyDefinition
data.value: exec [dbo].[sp_manage_column_properties] N'{{{domain}}}',N'{{{attribute}}}',N'{{{property}}}',N'{{{value}}}';

data.name: PSA_ControlDeleteDefinition
SYS_PSAAttributeDefinition
data.value: select * from [dbo].[psa_attribute_definition] where 1=1

data.name: SYS_PSAEntityDefinition
data.value: with x as ( select [psa_schema], [psa_entity], row_number() over (partition by [psa_schema],[psa_entity] order by [psa_attribute_ordinal],[psa_attribute]) [ord], convert(nvarchar(max), right(convert(nvarchar(42),hashbytes(N'sha1',[psa_attribute]),1),40)+N' : '+ right(convert(nvarchar(42),hashbytes(N'sha1',[psa_attribute_datatype]),1),40)+N' : '+ right(convert(nvarchar(42),hashbytes(N'sha1',convert(nvarchar(10),[psa_attribute_ordinal])),1),40)+N' : '+ right(convert(nvarchar(42),hashbytes(N'sha1',[psa_attribute_sort]),1),40)+N' : '+ right(convert(nvarchar(42),hashbytes(N'sha1',[psa_attribute_optional]),1),40)+N' : '+ right(convert(nvarchar(42),hashbytes(N'sha1',[psa_attribute_business_identifier]),1),40)) [sig] from [dbo].[psa_attribute_definition] ), [sel] as ( select e.[psa_schema], e.[psa_entity], e.[psa_entity_description], e.[psa_source_statement], e.[psa_source_predicate_values], e.[source_schema], e.[source_entity], e.[hash_large_objects], e.[psa_infer_deletions], e.[etl_build_group], right(convert(nvarchar(42),[dbo].[fn_hash](e.[hash_large_objects]),1),40)+N' : '+ right(convert(nvarchar(42),[dbo].[fn_hash](e.[etl_max_threads]),1),40)+N' : '+ right(convert(nvarchar(42),[dbo].[fn_hash](e.[psa_infer_deletions]),1),40) [logic_sig], rtrim(ca.ah) [construct_sig], isnull(c.[psa_attribute_count],0) [psa_attribute_count], e.[etl_max_threads], e.[etl_max_record_count] from dbo.[psa_entity_definition] e cross apply ( select convert(nvarchar(max),N'['+[sig]+N'] ') from x where e.[psa_schema]=x.[psa_schema] and e.[psa_entity]=x.[psa_entity] order by [ord] for xml path('') ) ca(ah) left join ( select [psa_schema], [psa_entity], count([ord]) [psa_attribute_count] from x group by [psa_schema], [psa_entity] ) c on e.[psa_schema]=c.[psa_schema] and e.[psa_entity]=c.[psa_entity] ) select [psa_schema], [psa_entity], [psa_entity_description], [psa_source_statement], [psa_source_predicate_values], [source_schema], [source_entity], [hash_large_objects], [psa_infer_deletions], [etl_build_group], isnull(right(convert(nvarchar(42),[dbo].[fn_hash]([logic_sig]),1),40),N'') [psa_logical_signature], isnull(right(convert(nvarchar(42),[dbo].[fn_hash]([construct_sig]),1),40),N'') [psa_construct_signature], [psa_attribute_count], [etl_max_threads], [etl_max_record_count] from [sel] where 1=1

data.name: PSA_LogicalSignatureLookup
data.value: select convert(nvarchar(40),[value]) [sig] from sys.extended_properties where [minor_id]=0 and [Name]=N'Logical Signature' and object_name([major_id])='{{{entity}}}' and object_schema_name([major_id])='{{{schema}}}';

data.name: PSA_ConstructSignatureLookup
data.value: select convert(nvarchar(40),[value]) [sig] from sys.extended_properties where [minor_id]=0 and [Name]=N'Construct Signature' and object_name([major_id])='{{{entity}}}' and object_schema_name([major_id])='{{{schema}}}';

data.name: PSA_DatabaseTemplate
data.value:
--:SETVAR DatabaseName '[edw_psa]' --:SETVAR Path 'A:\SQL\Data\'
use [master]; go
create database [edw_psa] on primary (NAME = N'psa_primary',FILENAME=N'A:\SQL\Data\psa_primary.mdf',SIZE=5120KB,MAXSIZE=UNLIMITED,FILEGROWTH=1024KB), filegroup [SNK] (NAME = N'psa_snk', FILENAME=N'A:\SQL\Data\psa_snk.ndf',SIZE=5120KB,MAXSIZE=UNLIMITED,FILEGROWTH=1024KB), filegroup [SPK] ( NAME = N'psa_spk', FILENAME = N'A:\SQL\Data\psa_spk.ndf' , SIZE = 5120KB , MAXSIZE = UNLIMITED, FILEGROWTH = 1024KB ), filegroup [TMP] ( NAME = N'psa_tmp', FILENAME = N'A:\SQL\Data\psa_tmp.ndf' , SIZE = 5120KB , MAXSIZE = UNLIMITED, FILEGROWTH = 1024KB ) LOG ON ( NAME = N'psa_log', FILENAME = N'A:\SQL\Log\psa_log.ldf' , SIZE = 5120KB , MAXSIZE = 2048GB , FILEGROWTH = 10%)
go
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET COMPATIBILITY_LEVEL = 110 GO
IF (1 = FULLTEXTSERVICEPROPERTY('IsFullTextInstalled')) begin EXEC [edw_psa].[dbo].[sp_fulltext_database] @action = 'disable' end GO
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET ANSI_NULL_DEFAULT OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET ANSI_PADDING OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET ANSI_WARNINGS ON GO
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET ARITHABORT OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET AUTO_CLOSE OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET AUTO_CREATE_STATISTICS ON GO
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET AUTO_SHRINK OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET AUTO_UPDATE_STATISTICS ON GO
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET CURSOR_CLOSE_ON_COMMIT OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET CURSOR_DEFAULT GLOBAL GO
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET CONCAT_NULL_YIELDS_NULL OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET NUMERIC_ROUNDABORT OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET RECURSIVE_TRIGGERS OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET ENABLE_BROKER GO
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET AUTO_UPDATE_STATISTICS_ASYNC OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET DATE_CORRELATION_OPTIMIZATION OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET TRUSTWORTHY OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET ALLOW_SNAPSHOT_ISOLATION OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET PARAMETERIZATION SIMPLE GO
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET READ_COMMITTED_SNAPSHOT OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET HONOR_BROKER_PRIORITY OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET RECOVERY FULL GO
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET MULTI_USER GO
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET PAGE_VERIFY CHECKSUM GO
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET DB_CHAINING OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET FILESTREAM( NON_TRANSACTED_ACCESS = OFF ) GO
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET TARGET_RECOVERY_TIME = 0 SECONDS GO
ALTER DATABASE [edw_psa] SET READ_WRITE GO

data.name: PSA_ControlSecurityDefinition
data.value: grant select,insert,update,delete on [{{{schema}}}].[{{{entity}}}.Control] to [psa_etl_manager];

PSA_LoadStageDefinition

PSA_WorkerUpsertDefinition
PSA_ServiceBrokerLoginDefinition
PSA_ServiceBrokerUserDefinition
PSA_ProcessUpsertSecurityDefinition
data.value: grant execute on [{{{schema}}}].[{{{entity}}}.ProcessUpsert] to [psa_etl_manager];

data.name: PSA_GetModel
data.value: with attr as ( select N'['+[psa_schema]+N'].['+[psa_entity]+N']' [@psa_domain], [psa_schema], [psa_entity], [psa_entity_description], [psa_source_statement], [psa_source_predicate_values], [source_schema], [source_entity], [hash_large_objects], [psa_infer_deletions], [etl_build_group], [etl_max_threads], [etl_max_record_count], convert(xml,sq.[attribute]) [attributes] from [master].[dbo].[psa_entity_definition] e cross apply ( select [psa_attribute], [psa_attribute_datatype], [psa_attribute_ordinal], [psa_attribute_sort], [psa_attribute_optional], [psa_attribute_business_identifier], [psa_attribute_description] from [dbo].[psa_attribute_definition] a where e.[psa_schema]=a.[psa_schema] and e.[psa_entity]=a.[psa_entity] for xml path('attribute') ) sq(attribute) ), ent([psa_model]) as ( select [@psa_domain], [psa_schema], [psa_entity], [psa_entity_description], [psa_source_statement], [psa_source_predicate_values], [source_schema], [source_entity], [hash_large_objects], [psa_infer_deletions], [etl_build_group], [etl_max_threads], [etl_max_record_count], [attributes] from attr for xml path('entity') ) select convert(xml,N'<entities>'+[psa_model]+N'</entities>') [psa_model] from ent;

data.comment: Contains DDL to build the required metadata tables in the master database. These tables drive object creation.
